text:
Jean-Louis Xavier Trintignant (born 11 December 1930) is a retired French actor. He won an César Award for Best Actor as Georges in the 2012 French movie "Amour".
On 20 July, 2018 he announced his retirement from cinema.
Trintignant was born on 11 December 1930 in Piolenc, Vaucluse, France. He was raised in Piolenc and in Paris. Trintignant was married to Stéphane Audran until they divorced. Then he was married to Nadine Marquand from 1960 until they divorced in 1976.
